repository.corpname: Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation & Archives

did.unittitle: Robert V. Pezdek Associate Degree Program File
did.physdesc: Administrative papers, minutes, reports, memoranda, notes.
did.abstract: Consists of Prof. Pezdek's files on the ILR Associates Degree.

defitem.label: Contact Information:
defitem.item: Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives Martin P. Catherwood Library 227 Ives Hall Cornell University Ithaca, NY 14853 (607) 255-3183> kheel_center@cornell.edu http://www.ilr.cornell.edu/library/kheel

bioghist.head: Biographical / Historical
bioghist.p: A graduate of the University of Pittsburgh and Carnegie Tech, Robert V. Pezdek was the ILR Librarian at Cornell's School of Industrial and Labor Relations.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Access to the collections in the Kheel Center is restricted. Please contact a reference archivist for access to these materials.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: This collection must be used in keeping with the Kheel Center Information Sheet and Procedures for Document Use.

prefercite.p: Robert V. Pezdek Associate Degree Program File #/3003. Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library.
